words.definition: Concerned with beauty or the nature of beauty.

example.en: The painting has an aesthetic quality.

words.definition: The analysis and judgment of a piece of work.
words.arabic_definition: تحليل عمل ما وإبداء الحكم عليه.

example.en: Literary criticism is an important part of literature studies.
example.ar: النقد الأدبي جزء مهم من دراسة الأدب.

words.definition: A figure of speech that describes one thing as another.
words.arabic_definition: صيغة بلاغية تصف شيئًا على أنه شيء آخر.

example.en: The poem uses a metaphor for life.

words.definition: The use of symbols to represent ideas.

example.en: The film uses strong symbolism throughout.
example.ar: يستخدم الفيلم رمزية قوية طوال الوقت.

words.definition: A spoken or written account of events.
words.arabic_definition: حكاية مكتوبة أو محكية عن أحداث.

example.en: The book has an engaging narrative.

words.definition: The central idea of a piece of literature or art.
words.arabic_definition: الفكرة المحورية لعمل أدبي أو فني.

example.en: The theme of the play is redemption.

words.definition: The circumstances or setting that surround an event.

example.en: Understanding the context of the novel is important.

words.definition: A recurring theme or element in a piece of literature.

example.en: The motif of isolation appears throughout the book.

words.definition: A reference to another work of literature, person, or event.
words.arabic_definition: مرجع إلى عمل أدبي آخر، شخص، أو حدث.

example.en: The poem contains an allusion to ancient myths.
example.ar: تحتوي القصيدة على إشارة إلى الأساطير القديمة.

words.definition: A detailed evaluation of a piece of work.

example.en: The review offered a strong critique of the film.
